headline: VoltaGrid and Halliburton Announce Strategic Collaboration to Deliver Distributed Power Solutions for the Global Data Center Industry
summary: HOUSTON, Oct. 20, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- VoltaGrid, a leading provider of distributed power and energy solutions, and Halliburton (NYSE: HAL), a global leader in energy services and technology, have signed an agreement to establish a strategic collaboration focused on delivering distributed power generation solutions for data centers worldwide, with the initial roll-out targeted for the Middle East.
